info.brief_description: It basically what it means at the title to let your ideas go crazy
info.description:
Welcome to the wedgie dimension, where any girl from any anime, video game or cartoon will be subjugated to any part of underwear or butts being punished or in some cases's shoving something up that certain characters back door. Anyway enjoy this but first rules. {ep:1}

1. The character must be a known character from any hit anime/ manga, video game and cartoon, yes you can make OC characters it is your choice.

2. Girl wedgies or any form of punishment to them involving their butts is allowed so no other weird fetish's being added on put into here. Ass only.

3. You can develop on what goes on a character does here. Meaning if a character does not like wedgies, you can develop them to get a fetish for them or two characters hate each other, you can develop them to be friends or more them that, Etc, etc.

4. The world that the wedgie dimension is, is ever growing so you can add your own type of creatures, people, to this world and have whoever you put into it experience it.

Other then that, its all set and to whoever wants to put in work to give someone a good story give it a whirl. Add whatever you want, make them do whatever you want as long as it tones to the story just have at it and enjoy.

One more thing. You can have characters meet up with each other so if you want a certain anime character to meet with a video game character. So yeah you can 100% can do that so enjoy
